item.title: 【Unreleased/Unofficial (lossless)】WAV - Kylie Minogue - Padam Padam (Album Edit)
item.description:
I decided to make an album edit of Padam using the Extended Mix and removing the section after the first chorus and before the second verse. I think that part took away from the flow of the song, while leaving the extended Into and ending. My album mix runs 3:33 I think it's the perfect blend of both mixes. Please let me know what you think, but be kind it is only my second attempt at something like this. I used a 24bit WAV file, Audacity and my ear,



Padam Padam (Album Edit)
item.author: HeBop2012
